description: RIA-1283 Notification to case officer and legal rep of submitted hearing requirements

notifications.subject: Immigration and Asylum appeal:hearing requirements submitted
body: # The appellant has submitted their hearing requirements.
Go to the Hearing tab to review and submit the hearing requirements and any requests for additional adjustments.
You should contact the appellant if you need more information.
When you've submitted the hearing requirements, the listing team will list the case.

notifications.subject: Asylum appeal: hearing requirements submitted
body: You've submitted your hearing requirements and any requests for additional adjustments. These are now available to view in the Hearing tab.
The Tribunal will review your hearing requirements.
If you've made any requests for additional adjustments, we'll review the information you provided and decide if the request's can be granted.
We'll then send you the Notice of Hearing.
